alert.note: Alert for Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 1:45AM CDT until July 24 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 145 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Reedsburg, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Reedsburg, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Delton, West Baraboo, North Freedom, La Valle, Rock Springs, Loganville, Ironton, Lime Ridge and Hill Point. This includes the following Locations Mirror Lake State Park and Kilbourn Dam. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
